title: bEne tALalAre
sahitya:
bEvu belladoLiDalEnu bala hAvige hAleredEnu bala


caraNam 1    kuTilava biDadiha manujaru japagaLa mADidarEnu bala 
kupita buddhiyanu tyajisade nityadi upavAsaviddarinnEnu bala
    caraNam 2    mAtA pitaranu baLalisuva mga yAtreya mADidarEnu bala 
ghAtakavanu biDade nirantara gIteyanodidarEnu bala
    caraNam 3    patiyanu nindisi pogaLuva satiyaLu vratagaLa mADidarEnu bala 
atithigaLeDeyali bhEdava mADuta gatiyanu bayasidarEnu bala
    caraNam 4    hIna krtyangaLa mADuta nadiyali snAnava mADidarEnu bala 
shrInidhi purandara viTTalana neneyade maunava mADidarEnu bala
